title: WTB: Want to make 1 more purchase before end of year
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB: Want to make 1 more purchase before end of year
posts.post_content:
I took some time off from working on my Cubs Sweet Caporal Front/Back Set, but looking to purchase one off of the following list before the end of the year.  Prefer that these are either in SGC or PSA holders, but will make an exception for the right card raw.  I will take any of these in lower grade, but keep in mind set so far is 3.5 average for HOF cards.

Mordecai Brown (Chicago on Shirt)    SC350/25
Mordecai Brown (Portrait)   SC 350/25
Frank Chance (Yellow Portrait)   SC 350-460/25
Johnny Evers (Chicago on Shirt) SC 350-460/25
Johnny Evers (Chicago on Shirt) SC 350-460/42
Johnny Evers (Portrait)   SC 350/25
Joe Tinker (Bat off Shoulder)   SC 350/25
Joe Tinker (Bat on Shoulder)   SC 350-460/25
Joe Tinker (Hands on Knees)   SC 350/25
Joe Tinker (Portrait)   SC 350/25

PM me anything you might have available or email [url]steve@asmusherefords.com[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
